name: Burner (itch)
description:
You are a monster! - said the theme.
Burning bugs with a magnifying glass is pretty evil, so here we are...
The more red the bug is, the more burned it is!
The longer it burns, the more point it's worth!

Solo Project for the Trijam #173! 
"Game" made in 3 hours!
